text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Aichi prefecture is famous for the Chukyo racetrack, home to the Takamatsunomiya Kinen G1 race —

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Takamatsunomiya Kinen is a 1200m short distance race on turf…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I'm certain Bakushin would do amazingly well in that…! She is, after all, unrivaled in sprints♪
